text: qul - 'ayuha alrasul - lilnaasa: 'atieuu allah wa'atieuu alrasula, fa'iin 'aeraduu fa'iinama ealaa alrasul fiel ma 'umr bih min tabligh alrisalati, waealaa aljamie fiel ma kullifwh min alamtithali, wa'iin tutieuh tarshaduu 'iilaa alhuq, walays ealaa alrasul 'iilaa 'an yablugh risalat rabih blaghana bynana
